patthana15.24:4.1: Hetusampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.24:5.1: Hetusampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.24:5.2: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.24:6.1: Hetuvippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetuvippayutto naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.24:6.2: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
